title: Shooting incident reported in Hikkaduwa
byline: A shooting has taken place targeting a house in Mawathagama, Hikkaduwa, police stated.

title: Two suspects linked to shooting arrested with ‘Ice’
byline: Two individuals allegedly involved in a shooting and intimidation have been arrested with crystal methamphetamine (‘Ice’) by the Western Province North Crime Division.

title: Heavy showers above 100 mm expected in several areas today
byline: The prevailing low-level atmospheric disturbance to the east of the island still persists.

title: Tornado kills one, injures four near French capital
byline: A tornado tore through districts north of Paris on Monday (Oct 20), toppling three construction cranes that killed one person and left four others with critical injuries, authorities said.

title: Donald Trump warns Hamas will be ‘eradicated’ if it violates Gaza truce
byline: US President Donald Trump warned on Monday (Oct 20) that Hamas would be “eradicated” if it breaks the fragile ceasefire with Israel, even as the United Nations and Israeli officials called for restraint after a weekend of renewed violence in Gaza.

title: Amazon’s AWS nears recovery after major outage disrupts apps, services worldwide
byline: Amazon said on Monday (Oct 20) that a cloud computing unit at its data centre in northern Virginia had largely contained fallout from a widespread internet outage that caused global turmoil among thousands of sites, including some of the web’s most popular apps like Snapchat and Reddit.

title: Level 2 landslide warnings issued to residents of five districts
byline: Level 2 landslide warnings have been issued to residents of multiple areas in five districts owing to incessant rains experienced in parts of the island.

title: Subjects and functions of several ministries amended
byline: A gazette notification has been published revising the subjects and functions of several ministries with effect from today.
